inn1.comm: gets good inward movement straightaway, from outside off and he tucks it to the on side
keeps it outside the off stump and he moves across and defends
squared him up a bit as he tried to work that through the on side, hits his pads and lobs away
moves right across his stumps and defends solidly this time
lands it outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
outside edge and it drops short of slip! He pokes at one that moves away
lands it outside the off stump and he safely shoulders arms, warm up delivery
Finch opens the face and steers him just wide of point
gets his rhythm here with an inswinger that lands on middle and leg and he works it straight to mid-on
direct hit but Finch is home! Tucks it down to square leg and Jeevan Mendis does well to underarm the throw to the stumps on the dive, no need to go to the third umpire
moves away from the right-hander and he leaves it alone
stays on the back foot and defends solidly
drifts towards the body and he shuffles and clips it to the on side
that natural inswinger, he stays back and works it to the on side
they're hitting the stumps this morning, but not quick enough, this was good running, turned it to mid-on and the other Mendis - Ajantha - hits the bowler's stumps
slants it across the left-hander and he knocks it wide of point
nips this one back in anfd Finch gets his pad across and leaves it alone
drifts towards the pads and Hughes tucks it to the on side
that's a friendly full toss and he just punches it away softly past cover, the yorker didn't quite come off
slides this one wide down the leg side, fails to control the movement
that's too straight on the pads and he shuffles and clips it with the movement wide of midwicket
much shorter in length and he stays right back at the crease and defends
stays beside the line and he taps it to the off side
stays right behind the line and he defends this one
on a good length outside off and he comes forward and defends
fullish outside off and he comes forward and defends
just short of a length outside off and he defends to the off side
just shortens his length and he pushes it back to the bowler
bowls it straight and he stays back and defends back to the bowler
comes beside the line and he steers it to the off side
outside edge, squared him up a bit and he edges that past the slips and down to third man
fires that full and wide outside off, he bends down and crashes that past backward point
another square drive but it's in the air and he spoons this over backward point, third man was square
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and tucks it off the pads
shimmies down the track and checks his drive, punches it wide of cover and they take three
gets across his stumps and pushes it to the off side
excellent running by Hughes, steers it wide of point and Malinga fumbles at third man, Hughes sets off for the second quickly
full outside off and moving away and he leaves it alone
full and moves away and he pushes forward and defends
full in length outside off and he comes forward and he pushes it wide of mid-off and cover, well timed
fullish in length outside off and he leaves it alone
lands it outside off and he opens the face and steers it to third man
good length outside off and he comes across and chops it to the off side
drifts on the pads and he gets across and clips it over midwicket, didn't time it as well as he would have liked
lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
good length drifting in on middle and leg and he punches it down the ground to mid-on
angles across him and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
attempted yorker and he comes across and drills it back to the bowler
stays behind the line and tucks it to the on side
comes back in and he clips it with the movement down to midwicket
good length on the off stump and steers it towards point
works it away off the body down to square leg
Hughes goes for a mighty heave and he misses it completely, outside off and it didn't bounce as much
that was a cleverly played, he saw there was no slip and deliberately steered that past the keeper, nice late cut
shot! Too wide outside off and he stays at the crease, stretches out and cuts that hard past backward point, does the bat twirl on the follow through
good length outside off and he defends to the off side
full on the stumps and he clips it down to square leg
tossed up and he stays back and defends
flatter delivery and he  opens the face and steers it to point
skids through and he tucks it behind square
outside edge! Mendis strikes in his first over of his one-day comeback, it was bowled off the back of the hand, Finch was prodding forward, bounced a bit more and took the edge, no doubts about that
tossed up outside off and he comes forward and shoulders arms
drifts on the body and he shuffles and clips it to fine leg, finds the gap there
stays back and he punches it towards mid-on
fullish on the pads and he works it down to square leg
full outside off and he gets forward and defends
good length on the off stump and he pushes it to point
fullish on the pads and he works it away towards mid-on
flatter delivery and he works it to midwicket
that was too wide of the leg stump and he leaves it alone
tossed up and he comes forward and works it to the on side
full on the off stump and he pushes it to mid-on
flatter one and he works it towards mid-on
fullish and flatter and he pushes it to the bowler
full outside off and he drives and nearly edges it
tossed up outside off and he comes forward and he comes forward and defends
slower delivery and he comes forward and defends
tossed up and he clips this one to long-on
tossed up and he defends this to the on side
tossed up and he clips it to the on side
fuller on the pads and he clips it to the on side for a couple
tossed up and he comes well forward and defends
quicker delivery and he stays back and defends
quicker delivery and he works it to the on side
fires that down the leg side and he doesn't offer a shot
flatter delivery and he leaves it alone
gets forward and he pushes it to mid-on
stays back at the crease and he pushes it to long-off
stays beside the line and cuts him to point
tossed up outside off he pushes it to cover

Appeal fora run out and Khawaja is in trouble! And he's gone! Schoolboy error by Khawaja, credit to Jeevan Mendis for this one, Khawaja worked it towards short midwicket and set off, he turned back and had to dive at the crease, he made the mistake of not sliding with his bat face on the ground, Mendis swooped down and under-armed the throw to the keeper Chandimal, top stuff by Mendis
tossed up and drilled down the ground to long-on
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
comes well forward and defends
comes forward to defend and the ball clips the pads and rolls away, missing leg
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and works it away down to fine leg
tossed up and he comes forward and drives to cover
comes well forward and he gets an inside edge to the on side

Another appeal for a run out and Bailey is just home! Hughes softly pushed it to mid-on and there was hesitation, Hughes set off after a bit and Bailey was ball-watching, had to hurry, the throw was slow to the keeper
flatter ball and turned towards square leg
tossed up outside off and he comes well forward and defends
fuller delivery and he pushes it down to long-on
stays back and punches it down to long-on
drops it short and he cuts him
stays back and clips it off his pads
tossed up and he leans forward and drives wide of cover
pitched up and he works it down to long-on
he comes forward and defends
stays back and punches it to the off side
comes round the wicket, he stays back and defends
good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends

another appeal for a run-out! What's happening guys? Bailey punches it towards point where Dilshan does well to dive and stop it, Bailey was ball-watching, Hughes set off, confusion, Bailey took off rather late, Dilshan's throw was weak and Bailey had time to dive
comes forward and works it wide of mid-off
stays back and defends this one
full outside off and he pushes it towards mid-off
good length on the pads and he works it down to square leg
he swishes at one outside off, extra bounce for Perera
fuller delivery and he works it down to mid-on
tucks it away down to short midwicket
full on the pads and he works him down to mid-on, the fielder is a bit deep
thudded down the ground! Half volley outside the off stump, he gets forward and bashes it wide of the bowler who tries to boot it away, beats mid-off
full on the off stump and he comes forward and defends
gets forward and pushes it towards mid-off
stays beside the line and he punches it to the off side
stays beside the line and he steers it towards point
too straight on the pads and he drills it down to long-on
that was wide outside off and Hughes reaches out and cuts, twirls his bat on the follow through
stays back and he works it to the on side
drops it a fraction short, stays back and works it to midwicket
slower through the air and defended softly
tossed up outside off and pushed to the off side
that was a googly, rocked back and pulled to square leg
another googly but he works it off his pads and the ball drops to the on side
stays back and works it away to the on side
just opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
stays at the crease and punches it to the vacant cover point region and calls quickly
nicely timed, this was full, the slower ball in fact and he drills a half volley down the ground and beats a diving mid-off
full outside the off stump and he works it down to cover
just closes the face of the bat and works it just wide of midwicket
that was well played! Bailey moved right across his stumps and pulled him behind square on one knee, well in control, Malinga at fine leg couldn't stop it
comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
comes forward and pushes it to cover
goes back and pulls him wide of midwicket
tossed up outside off and he gets forward and drills it wide of cover
fuller and flatter and Bailey plonks forward and defends
stays back and he steers it to the off side, bit of extra bounce
fuller and he comes forward and defends
just short of a length and he opens the face and runs it down to third man
turns it away down to square leg for a single
stays beside the line and he turns it down to point
good length on the off stump and he steers it to the off side
tossed up and it's a full toss which he drills wide of mid-off, puts away a boundary ball
tossed up and he stays back and defends
tossed up outside off and he cuts him square on the off side
tossed up and Baily chips down the track and he lofts him high and crisp over long-on, didn't look to hit it too hard, top shot
short of a length and he punches it to the off side
stays back and steers it to the off side
shot! This was short of a length on middle and leg, Hughes stays back and pulls on one leg wide of square leg, quite stylish
stays back and punches it to the off side
to short and wide and Perera gets away with a dot ball, thumped straight to point
moves to the 80s! Half volley outside the off stump, he gets forward and drives off the meat of the bat past cover and even beats the sweeper
starts off with a loosener on the pads which he clips away down to fine leg
short outside off and he shapes to cut and ends up chopping it on the first bounce to the keeper
bangs it in short and he ducks under the bouncer, two are allowed for the over as per the new rules
full and wide outside off and he drives him down to long-off
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls along the ground to fine leg
another sharp bouncer and it just fizzes past Hughes' helmet
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls him down to deep square leg
stays beside the line and he steers it to the off side
goes across and punches him straight to mid-off
that's a slower ball and he swivels and pulls down to fine leg, finds the gap and hits it hard enough to send it through
another one down to fine leg! Bad ball from Perera, down the leg side and short, turns at the crease and pulls this one finer
fullish outside the off stump and he drives straight to short cover
slower ball and he pushes it towards backward point
squared him up and the leading edge nearly pops back to the bowler on the full
Malinga's exploiting the new bouncer rule well, Hughes bends down and evades it
fullish outside off and he comes forward and pushes it to the off side
another bouncer, the slower one this time, sails over Hughes' arched back
fullish in length outside off and pushed down to cover and that's a maiden
nips back in and he clips it wide of midwicket, Hughes wants two and the throw to the bowler's end was very wide and that's a fifty for the Aus captain!
stays back and punches him away down to mid-off
this was shorter and pulled away down  to square leg
drifts back in and he clips it away down to deep midwicket
banged in short and he swivels and works him down to deep square leg
drifts on the pads and he works him down to mid-on
bowls it flatter and he rocks back and slaps it to the sweeper on the off side
slower and tossed up and he whips it behind square on the leg side
too wide outside off and slapped away hard to the sweeper
mid-on's up! Tossed up and he comes down the track and hammers a full toss down to long-on
fuller on the stumps and pushes it to square leg
full outside the off stump and he drills it down to long-off
bowls it flatter and he gets down and plays the front foot pull
full and wide outside the off stump and he drills it to the off side
full outside off and he thuds it towards cover
comes round the wicket, Hughes tries to dab it away late and he misses it
tossed up on the pads and he works it away to square leg
slower through the air, he stays back and punches it towards mid-off
full outside the off stump and pushed to the off side
drops it a bit short and he swivels and plays a short arm pull
nearly gave it away! Tossed up and went for the slog and the ball just sneaked past the bat and the off stump
tossed up outside the off stump and he stays back and cuts him to deep point
drifts on the pads and he works it away to square leg
worked away off the pads down to midwicket and they really have to hurry the single
stays back and he works it down to point
keeps a touch low and wide outside off and he cuts him wide of point, sneaks in a single
this one spins back in sharply, makes room and chops it down to point
quicker one and he opens the face and dabs it down to short third man
fullish outside the off stump and drilled down the ground down to long-off
slower ball and shorter, stays back and opens the face and dabs it down to short third man
fires that full outside the off stump and he gets his bat down to and jams it down to point, throw to the bowler was wide
he's now just three away! Lovely improvisation, Malinga fired that full and wide outside off, used the pace on that and squirted it wide of point, raced away
slower ball and wide down the leg side and tucked away just wide of the keeper
excellent placement! Malinga fires that full and wide, close to a yorker length, Bailey got his bat down and crunched that wide of cover and beat the sweeper in the deep
moves to 99, pushes it in front of cover for a single
stays back and punches him down to long-on
stays back and chops it down to short third man, tries to pinch a run!

first Australian to score a ODI ton on debut! Bowls round the wicket, on the pads and he easily clips it wide of midwicket, saves the emotion for when he grounds his bat at the other end, well played PJ! Takes off his helmet
bangs it in short and he rocks back and pulls him wide of midwicket, not the most attractive of shots
didn't control that one, just managed to scoop that over extra cover
seeing the ball too well is he Hughes, slower ball short of a length wide outside off and he makes room and bashes it wide of point
power! This was fired fuller and wide outside off, made room and simply thrashed that past cover, the bat twirl on the follow through again
good comeback by Malinga, slower ball and he saw him make room and cramped him up, Hughes tried to run it down to third man

Hughes swings and gets an edge! This was the slower ball, outside off, Hughes made room and tried to mow him across the line over midwicket, gets a thick edge and the ball loops towards Chandimal who takes it falling forward
fullish on the pads and clipped behind square
makes room and he manages to push a full ball down to mid-off
fullish on the stumps and drilled down the ground to long-on
slower ball on the stumps and he softly pushes him down to mid-off
that's a low full toss which he drills down to long-on
good slower ball to end the over, on a yorker length which he jams out down the pitch
slower ball outside off and he squirts it out to the off side
that was full and wide and Bailey shaped to drive that straighter and he ended up getting an outside edge that beat the keeper and ran down to third man
hits a good length outside off and he forces it towards cover
slower ball and he makes room and steers him down to cover point
another slower ball which he works away down to midwicket
makes a hint of room and he punches it towards mid-off
finds the gap at deep square leg, gets on his knee and sweeps him along the ground, the fielder has a lot of ground to cover
straight! Tossed up and he gets to the pitch of it and lofts crisply over the bowler's head, crisply hit
nearly back to back fours, this was short outside off and he rocked back and slapped it behind point, fielder did well to cut it off before the rope
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
this one skids through and he cuts to point
that was a slower ball and shorter, he made room and chipped down the track and thumped it over cover
well played! This was short of a length and he stayed back and clubbed it behind square leg, Australia could get to 300 here
makes a hint of room and he squirts it behind point
no century for Bailey I'm afraid! This was the slower ball and a touch short, pulled in front of square and it went flat and fast to Jeevan Mendis at deep midwicket
punches it towards cover and tells his partner to wait
punches it back to the bowler and it's another dot ball
slower ball and he drills it down the ground to long-on
good improvisation! He knew there was no third man, this was short outside off and gaining on him, opened the face of the bat and placed it well above short third man
makes room and drills it back to the bowler, Kula tries to fling it back to the stumps and misses
makes room and gets an inside edge to the leg side
fuller delivery and he drills it down to long-on
the slower ball gets him, the leg cutter and Hussey walks down the pitch looking to chip it over the on side, doesn't control it and A Mendis jogs ti his right at midwicket and takes it
clipped to the leg side for a single
full toss on the pads and Hussey works it for a single through square leg
this one goes very wrong as Malinga tries for the slower ball and it sails way down leg side for a wide
gets the yorker right this time and it's kept out safely
fuller delivery and he works it away wide of midwicket
slower ball and he plays and misses
slower ball and tucked away to midwicket
worked wide of mid-on and midwicket stops it
slower ball and he pulls it wide of long-on
chips it over midwicket and the sweeper runs across and pulls it back in front of the rope
punches it towards mid-off
slower ball and he punches it towards cover
short delivery and he pulls it wide of mid-on
yorker length delivery which he squirts out to the leg side
yorker length and he jams it out and he limps the single
driven back to Malinga who boots it away
driven down to long-on and Dilshan dives and stops it
passes between his legs and they sneak in a bye
good death bowling and he eases a single to cover
pulls a short ball wide of square leg
back to back boundaries! He steers a full delivery wide of the covers for a boundary
backs away and clips it towards midwicket
yorker length and he digs it out to mid-on
goes for the cut and he jams it back to the bowler
fullish on the pads and he clips it wide of mid-on
backs away and drives it wide of mid-on
works a yorker length and he drills it wide of midwicket
he chips it over mid-off and J Mendis does well to stop it at the rope
full on the stumps and he works it wide of midwicket
looks to sweep this one but misses
full on the stumps and he drills it wide of midwicket
down the track and launches it over long-off and Hussey brings up his fifty
full on the stumps and he drives wide of midwicket
hits it straight, Jeevan Mendis runs across and tries to cut it off and parries it to long-off

inn2.comm: full and moves away from him and he defends
leaves it alone to the keeper
drifts down the leg side and wide called
gets some extra bounce and he defends to the off side
he gets across and defends
fullish delivery on the off stump and he stays behind the line to defend
pushes it towards cover
he strays well down the leg side and wide called
pushes at it and it misses the outside edge
full and moves away and he swishes and misses
short outside off and moves away and he leaves it alone
tucks it away to the leg side and he doesn't take the single
this one moves back in and he goes for the drive and the ball passes the pad and bat
good length delivery and tucked to the on side
full and wide outside off and he gets an outside edge on the drive and it goes to third man
this was full and wide outside off and he goes for the drive and gets an outside edge that goes past first slip
good length outside off and he defends back to the bowler
full on the off stump and driven to cover
pitched up and moving away and he drives wide of cover
Tharanga goes! Starc just put it in the right spot, no noticeable movement and Tharanga pushes at it outside off and a thick edge through to Haddin
taps it to the off side and he thinks of a single, direct hit and he was safe at the crease, direct hit and Jayawardene was home
stays back and defends this one
loose ball on the pads, it was a half volley and he whips it just wide of midwicket
nips back in and he stays back and tries to cut but ends up chopping it away
just short of a length and he taps it towards third man
angles across him and he stays back and defends
full and angling across him and he comes across and drives to cover
skids through and hits his pads and lobs to the off side as he tries to work it to the on side
that was nicely driven but straight to the fielder at mid-on, shows the full face of the bat
short and wide outside off and he gets across and cuts towards point
the captain goes! Good delivery by McKay, lands on a good length outside off, Jayawardene pokes his bat out and the edge goes to Finch at first slip
this was full and moving away and he went forward and defended it
stays back and defends it to the leg side
goes back at the crease and he pushes it down to point
moves it back in to the right-hander and he defends it
fires that full outside the off stump and he pushes it back to the bowler
just drops short of third man! This was short and wide outside off and Dilshan slashed it, it went flat and quick and Khawaja dives and did well to at least save four runs
fuller delivery and he leaves it alone
smashed! That was a half volley outside off and he bent his knee and crashed it past cover, textbook drive
gets across and defends
slash and a miss, it was wide outside off and Chandimal couldn't resist temptation
the boundaries are flowing now! It was a half volley outside off and Dilshan went forward and thrashed that between mid-off and cover
nips back in and he tucks it to the on side
drifts towards the body and he shuffles and tucks it to the leg side
nips back in and he tucks it towards midwicket and sets off for a quick single
stays beside the line and steers it just wide of the diving point fielder
hits a good length and he stays back and defends
on target around the off stump, he stays back and defends
fires that full on the off stump and he jams it out to mid-off
good rhythm here, on the off stump and he forces it on the back foot
fuller in length on middle and leg and he works it away wide of midwicket
short ball down the leg side and he shoulders arms
good length delivery just outside the off stump and he gets good carry to the keeper
good length on the stumps and solidly defended back to the bowler
short and wide outside off and he slashes and misses, a false shot
just short of a length and he pushes it to the off side
bends his knee slightly and he drives to point
works it away down to mid-on with the angle
fires that full outside off and he biffs that away but straight to cover, too bad it wasn't in the gap
short of a length outside off and wide and he rocks back and cuts him wide of backward point
short of a length and he rocks back and tucks it to the on side
back of a length on the off stump and he clips him to the on side
another booming cover dive finds the fielder, full and wide and deserving to be spanked, Hughes does well at short cover
full outside off and he jams it out to the off side
excellent fielding! Maxwell's the man this time at backward point, this was short and wide outside off and he slapped it
slower ball and he swivels and pulls him in front of square, Smith cuts it off, not sure who he's in for
gets away with a short and wide start, Dilshan hacks straight to point.
tosse dup at 85 kph on middle and leg, Dilshan reaches out and plays it back.
another half-tracker, Dilshan cuts into the covers and they hustle back for two. Not the best bit of timing.
tossed up in off, Dilshan leans out and pushes into the covers. They sprint through for a single.
hint of spin away from off stump, Chandimal stays back and pushes to the offside.
flighted on leg and Chandimal drives it through to long-on for a single.
good length, attacking the stumps, and it is blocked down the pitch.

boy, what a gorgeous stroke! This is why so much is expected of Chandimal. It was a length ball angling across, Chandimal half-stepped towards the line and then let his hands do the job. Expansive, on the up, inside out and over the infield for four through cover.
not so pretty this time.. It was slightly shorter, and Chandimal flashed at it wildly. The thick edge flew safely through third man for another four.
Mitch corrects the line, gets it straighter and Chandimal works it to the leg side for one.
edged, but safe. Dilshan jabs hard at another angler outside off, and it went through where third slip would have been.
short of a length to end the over - a good one for SL. Chandimal defends from the crease.
on a length, defended off the front foot.
on the stumps, worked with the angle softly to the leg side. Haddin charged after it and flicked under arm towards the bowler's end, but Dishan was easily through.
Chandimal pushes a single off the front foot.
short and turning, but the ball stops on Dilshan as he shapes to cut. He mistimes it to point.
straightening from leg, Dilshan goes down to sweep and misses out. He hits it well, but straight to short fine leg.
finally Dilshan gets the cut away. Short, wide, asking for trouble, and Doherty eventually pays the price as Dilshan eludes point and sweeper cover. Things looking up for Sri Lanka.
fires that on the stumps and he comes across and punches it to the off side
shorter in length and he stays behind the line and defends to the off side
not sure what he was trying to do, too close to cut, cramped for room, the ball dribbles towards the keeper
once again looks to cut and he chops it towards point
good length on middle and leg and he stays back and defends
close call for Dilshan as he sweeps and the ball lobs off the back of the bat and goes over Haddin's head, he didn't see it at all

Appeal for an lbw turned down and Doherty reviews it. Tossed up and lands on leg stump and he goes for the sweep and the ball hits the back leg, Reiffell shakes his head. Ball tracker showed that clearing the stumps, just about
flighted outside off and he defends
tossed up and full and he drives him wide of cover
full outside off and he pushes it back to the bowler
comes round the wicket, drops it shortish outside off and he rocks back and cuts
stays back and clips it with the turn to mid-on
stays back and taps it softly to the off side
he goes for the cut this time and he's beaten, extra bounce
makes room and tries to find the gap past point, another dot
tossed up and he comes  forward and works it to mid-on
flatter delivery and he moves back and cuts
wants to work it past cover point, another dot
finds that gap finally, flatter delivery and a touch short, makes room and cuts behind square and wide of the fielder
pushed through quicker and he blocks it out
makes room and cuts wide of point to the sweeper
fullish on the pads and clipped to the on side
tossed up and he gets across and cuts him to Starc at sweeper cover
skids through, he goes back and punches it to the on side
goes back and works it to the on side
maximum! Tossed up from round the wicket, Chandimal chips down the track and lofts him over wide long-on and the spectator fluffs the catch about seven rows back
full on the stumps and pushed to long-on
tossed up and he clips it behind square
tossed up down the leg side and he gets on his knee and sweeps
goes back and punches it to the off side
clipped off the pads for a single
tossed up and defended to the on side
rocks back at the crease and cuts hard to sweeper cover
beats him! Slower through the air from Hussey, drives and misses
goes back at the crease and he rocks back and cuts behind point
goes back at the crease and works it to the on side
goes back at the crease and cuts it hard to sweeper cover
pushed through quicker and Dilshan defends
tossed up outside off and gives him width, slaps it to the deep
slower through the air and he gets well forward and defends
flatter delivery and he turns the face and works it to short square leg
attempts the late cut but finds short third man
slower through the air, tries to cut but misses
makes a bit of room and cuts just wide of short third man
drills it down the track and Hussey collides with Dilshan as he stops that
nice timing! Tossed up outside off and Chandimal makes room and places it well and finds the rope at deep point
tossed up and he drives him wide of cover
slower through the air and he comes forward and pushes it to the off side
slower through the air, spins back in and he cuts wide of cover
that was wide outside off and Chandimal left it alone expecting it to be called a wide, borderline
Maxwell gives him width again and he decides to chase that, carves it over backward point
stays back and cuts him behind square
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and he clips it off his pads to the leg side
good length on the stumps and he defends
lovely shot! Talent there, this was full and wide outside off, Chandinal went on his knee and drilled it wide of point on one knee, top square drive
short of a length and pushed towards point
short on the body and he clips it to the on side
the slower bouncer almost and Dilshan swivels and pulls him down to fine leg
shuffles and clips it with the turn to square leg and that's Dilshan's fifty
flatter delivery and he works it down to long-on
tossed up and he cuts to the off side
tossed up and he comes forward and drives to midwicket
Tossed up and he gets forward and drills it down to long-on

Direct hit and Dilshan looks in trouble! Yes he is a mile out, it was a risky run, he pushed it towards mid-off and set off, Khawaja attacked the ball, picked up and hit the stumps direct at the bowler's end, the Australians all knew it
fires that full and he pushes it towards mid-off
full outside off and he stylishly pushes it wide of mid-off and that's his fifty, well done. Plenty left to do
on a yorker length and he gets an inside edge to the pads and then to the leg side
short of a length outside off and he stays back and defends
fires that fuller outside off and he jams it back to the bowler
full outside off and he pushes it wide of cover and Chandimal wanted two but Mathews was a bit slow
fires that outside off and he works it to the on side
strays too wide down the leg side
full outside off and he drives and misses
full outside off and he looks to drive but misses
good length outside off and he defends this to the off side
tries to squirt that past point but he's beaten
tossed up on the off stump and he gets forward and defends
tossed up and he comes forward and clips it to the on side
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
chips down the track and he checks the drive and defends
stays back and mistimes the pull towards midwicket
tossed up and he comes well forward and drives to cover
stays back and he tucks it wide of midwicket
Full outside off and Mathews goes over the top on seeing a few fielders up, clears cover but can't get it to the rope
fires that full outside off and he jams it straight to cover
bangs it it short and he times the pull well but can't find the gap at deep midwicket
bowls it short again and he pulls him over deep square leg for a couple
full on the pads and he clips it wide of midwicket for a couple

Appeal for a run-out and Mathews is in trouble and the direct hit sends him back! Tossed up and Chandimal drops it to the off side, the striker tells Mathews to stay back, Mathews was already a few yards in front and had to turn back and Maxwell hits the stumps at the bowler's end

Two run outs off successive  balls would you believe it! It's that man Maxwell again. Chandinal dropped it towards short cover and set off, hesitation in the running, Maxwell runs to his right, picks up and in one movement fires the ball to Haddin, Thirimanne is not in the frame
could have been a hat-trick! Dropped towards short third man, Mendis was a few yards out of his crease, Chandimal sent him back
drops it short outside off and he cuts him wide of point and cover
chips down the track and he drives and Hussey misfields at mid-off
goes back and turns it to the on side
stays back and he slaps him wide of point
flatter delivery and he comes forward and defends
comes forward and drives a low full toss to cover
stays back and he pushes it back to the bowler
flatter ball on the pads and he works it to the leg side
tossed up and Mendis plays the reverse sweep and places it to cover, not where he intended
tucks it down to square leg
flatter delivery and he cuts it to the off side
take that! Tossed up on middle and leg and Mendis chips down the track and lofts him about 15 rows over deep midwicket
down the track and he looks to heave and he gets an inside edge to short fine leg
full and driven down to long-on
down the ground! Tossed up and wide and he uses the width well to crash it wide of cover
gets on his knee and paddles him down to fine leg
steps down the track and awkwardly punches it back to the bowler
shuffles and works it to the on side
flatter delivery and he makes room and he cuts and the outside edge beats the keeper
goes for the slog and it sneaks past the off stump, Haddin fumbles and he picks up a bye
pushed through quicker and he defends
tossed up and he drives wide of long-off
pushed through flatter and Chandimal gets on his knee and slogs him flat over midwicket, one bounce and four
punches it down to long-on
a boundary straight after drinks! Bangs it in short and he swivels and clubs him away down to fine leg, finds the big gap
drifts on the pads and he clips it in the air and there's nobody at square leg
beats him outside the off stump as he pokes his bat out
would have been a superb catch had Maxwell got there! Hurried for pace and Mendis gets a leading edge and Maxwell swoops down at short point and it just drops short
stays back and he works it to the on side
soft dismissal! Length ball skids through and Mendis tries to launch it over the bowler's head, not in control and he miscues it to mid-off, easy catch to Bailey
fullish outside off and he chips it in the air just over cover, Chandimal battles despite the hamstring
pitches it up and Chandimal is beaten on the drive
good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends

superb catch by Haddin! McKay pitched it up and bowled it wide of the off stump getting him to drive, thick outside edge and Haddin timed his dive to his right very well and plucked it one-handed. He nonchalantly tosses the ball away. Made it seem to easy, but it was one tough take!
nearly another wicket, short on the body and he chipped it in the air down to square leg
just short of a length and he stays back and defends
tucked him up for room and he awkwardly pushes it to cover
skids through and Perera goes for the slash and he's beaten
fires that full and wide outside off and he slashes and that's in the air down to third man
drifts on the pads and he puts his front pad out and heaves him over square leg, finds the gap, SL need plenty more of these
awkwardly fends off a short ball on the body, scampers the single
short of a length on the body and he tucks it away down to square leg
short down the leg side and Kula goes for the hook and nearly gloves it, Haddin starts to appeal but withdraws
another short one and another attempted hook, passes the glove and Haddin goes through with the appeal, late call for a wide by Reiffel
he continues peppering him with the short one, Kula swivels and pulls him down to fine leg, just beats fine leg
tucked away behind square for a single
full on the stumps and he heaves him down to deep midwicket
the slower ball and Perera doesn't read it, goes for the heave and Haddin comes well forward and takes it on the first bounce
slower delivery and he gets a bottom edge to the keeper
that was too short and quick for Kula, he bends down and evades it
slower ball and Kula's eyes light up as he backs away and heaves him over deep midwicket, muscled that one
makes room and he mistimes the cut to the off side
full on the off stump and he spoons it towards cover, had to scamper that single
that was full and wide and he chased it, ended up scooping it towards third man, unconventional
straight to mid-off! It was the off cutter from Johnson, he makes room and spoons it flat and fast to Bailey who takes a low catch
fires that full from round the wicket and he squirts it out to the off side
full outside off and he drives him down to cover
that was short and down the leg side and he swivels and tries to pull
pulls and it's in the air and he just clears midwicket
slower ball outside off and he opens the face and gently dabs it down to third man
drifts wide down the leg side and he tries to work it away
he drifts wide down the leg side and another wide
Bailey seems to be catching everything, very soft dismissal, short of a length, Kula shaped to smash that over mid-on, miscued and it lobs to Bailey

it's all over, at the stroke of the 40th over! Catching practice for Haddin, Mendis gets a length ball which he presumably wants to dab to third man, only managed a thick edge, Haddin would have caught that with his eyes shut
